LanguageData.Bed_Insulation_Cold.label: Insulation - Cold
LanguageData.Bed_Insulation_Cold.description: How much this bed improves minimum comfortable temperature. Greater values allow surviving in colder temperatures.
LanguageData.Bed_Insulation_Heat.label: Insulation - Heat
LanguageData.Bed_Insulation_Heat.description: How much this bed improves maximum comfortable temperature. Greater values allow surviving in warmer temperatures.
Insulation material effect multiplier for cold
Insulation material effect multiplier for heat
LanguageData.Textile_Softness.label: Softness
LanguageData.Textile_Softness.description: Determines how comfortable something made out of this can be. When used in beddings, it affects how much rest the bed provides.
